channel.title: dewiweb – Typescript
channel.description: Recent content in Typescript on dewiweb

item.title: music-constellation
item.description:
Overview

A web application that represents a beets music library as an interactive constellation. Each star is an album or artist, and the links between them illustrate relationships (genres, years, similarities).

A poetic, visual way to explore your music collection.

Features

  • Connect to a beets library (via the beets web API)
  • SVG/Canvas constellation graph representation
  • Interactive navigation (zoom, pan, select)
  • Filter by genre, decade, artist

Stack

  • TypeScript
  • Visualisation: D3.js or Canvas
  • Backend: beets API

Links

  • GitHub repository
  • Language: TypeScript

item.title: Bitfocus Companion modules
item.description:
Overview

Bitfocus Companion turns an Elgato Stream Deck into a professional control surface for broadcast and stage equipment. These modules integrate specific devices.

companion-module-canon-network-legacy-http

Repository · github.com/dewiweb/companion-module-canon-network-legacy-http

Companion module for controlling Canon cameras via the legacy HTTP network API. Allows driving compatible Canon cameras from a Stream Deck.

  • Language: JavaScript · Protocol: HTTP

companion-module-powersoft-amplifier

Repository · github.com/dewiweb/companion-module-powersoft-amplifier

Companion module for controlling Powersoft amplifiers. Monitor and control Powersoft amps (X series, Quattrocanali, etc.) from a Stream Deck.

  • Language: TypeScript

item.title: trajectoires-modern
item.description:
Overview

Full rewrite of the Trajectoires application, a web/mobile interface for controlling sound spatialisation via OSC. This modernised version is developed in TypeScript with a revised architecture.

Trajectoires lets you draw and animate trajectories for sound sources in space, then send them in real time to a spatialisation system.

Features

  • GUI for defining movement trajectories
  • Real-time OSC output
  • Modern TypeScript architecture
  • Compatible with OSC systems (Holophonix, Max/MSP, etc.)

Links

  • GitHub repository
  • Language: TypeScript

item.title: Broadcast & media
item.description:
sofie-emberplus-connection

Fork · github.com/dewiweb/sofie-emberplus-connection

Ember+ connection layer for Sofie — the modern TV news studio automation system. TypeScript Ember+ communication layer.

  • Language: TypeScript

pi-list

Fork · github.com/dewiweb/pi-list

Live IP Software Toolkit from the EBU to assist in implementing IP facilities (ST2110, AES67). Analysis and monitoring tool for IP media streams.

  • Language: C++

media-network-manager-cloud

Fork · github.com/dewiweb/media-network-manager-cloud

MnMs — set of tools for monitoring and administering real-time media networks (ST2110, AES67, Dante…).

ear-production-suite

Fork · github.com/dewiweb/ear-production-suite

VST plugin suite for producing and reproducing immersive and personalisable audio, based on the Audio Definition Model (ADM) and ITU renderer.

  • ⭐ 1 star

pam

Fork · github.com/dewiweb/pam

Audio Monitoring Software designed to run on a Raspberry Pi with touchscreen.

  • ⭐ 1 star · Language: C++

BM-Camera-Control-WebUI

Fork · github.com/dewiweb/BM-Camera-Control-WebUI

Extensible web interface for Blackmagic camera control.

  • Language: JavaScript
